name: Modules.Cloud.PushSchedules
summary: Provides methods for scheduling Arrow push notifications

methods.name: create
methods.description:
Requires user login and the current user must be an application admin.

See push_schedules/create.json for the request parameters supported by this method.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: query
methods.summary: Queries the list of scheduled push notifications.
methods.description:
Requires user login and the current user must be an application admin.

See push_schedules/qyery.json for the request parameter supported by this method.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: remove
methods.description:
Requires user login and the current user must be an application admin.

See push_schedules/delete.json for the request parameters supported by this method.

parameters.name: callback
